resources.string:
Working skills:
 Java Core, OOP, Java Collections, Exceptions, Multithreading etc
 Android SDK
 JDBC, Servlets, JSP, JSTL, XML, JSON
 SQLite, MySQL
 Unit Testing (Junit)
 Spring, Hibernate
 Android Studio, Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA
 Git, SVN, Tomcat, Maven 
 Additional software: 
 Linux, Windows

Experience
 2008 – till now:
 Content manager, IceCat Netherlands-Ukraine (http://www.icecat.biz/)
 - Products information search on European (United Kingdom, Spain, Germany, Italy, Benelux, Poland and others), American and Australian manufacturer sites.
 - Place products specifications data into special forms (manually / using iMacros automated tool).
 2003 – 2015:
 Research Scientist in the Institute for Low Temperature Physics and Engineering of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine.

Education
 2015 - 2016:
 Oracle Academy - Java Fundamental/Programming/Enterprise (Kharkov).
 2003 - 2009:
 Ph.D student, researcher; scientific profession "Solid State Physics". The thesis was defended in October 2009.
 1998 - 2003:
 Magister of Physics; Physics Faculty; V. N. Karazin Kharkiv National University; Kharkov, Ukraine.
